channel.title: Reciprocal on Dr. Mowinckel's
channel.description: Recent content in Reciprocal on Dr. Mowinckel's

item.title: Teaching you - teaching me
item.description: Teaching is rewarding, especially in coding workshops. Reflecting on experiences from Digital Scholarship Days at the University of Oslo, I learned valuable lessons from learners about Quarto slides, project management, and teaching challenges. Continuous improvement in teaching methods benefits both instructors and learners.
